net.openhft.chronicle.map

Interface DefaultValueProvider<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - map key class
    V - map value class
    All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    public interface DefaultValueProvider<K,V>
extends Serializable
    Default value computation strategy, used in AbstractChronicleMapBuilder.defaultValueProvider(DefaultValueProvider) configuration.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      V get(K key)
      Returns a value to be put during ChronicleMap.acquireUsing(Object, Object) call for the specified key, if it is absent in the map.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        V get(K key)
        Returns a value to be put during ChronicleMap.acquireUsing(Object, Object) call for the specified key, if it is absent in the map.
        Parameters:
        key - key absent in the map
        Returns:
        value to be put for the specified key in the map
